Name: DriftKing 2D
About the game: ​DriftKing 2D/3D features:​ 3D Hub world (Menu) Work in progress! -Beta Story Mode. (DK 3D) Endless Mode (DK 2D) Races! EasterEggs! Multiple biomes to explore! Collect new music! Additional side-missions & Minigames! Day/Night Cycle (21:00 PM Local Time = 21:00 PM In-Game Time) 2D & 3D Additional Steam/PC features:​ Achievements! Play with Keyboard, Mouse, Controller or by using Touch! Free updates! (Paid DLC will never happen!) New and updated biomes, vehicles, missions, Music, Game modes, Secrets, Optimizations, bug fixes!, & more! -Feedback is always very welcome & will directly impact development.- - (Local) Splitscreen​ DK 2D & 3D multiplayer coming in the next Feature Update. DriftKing 3D Game Mode - Concept Animation -Not ingame footage- Stay Tuned for more info! The following Keys will be replaced with a new key when DriftKing3D (New Game mode in DriftKing2D) is launched! Stay Tuned.
